metadata.name: HERO #1
metadata.description: AIRx HERO is the next generation of Blockchain Avatars using Artificial Intelligence. AI has found it way into the metaverse and HEROs were created! Own unique 1 of 5050 Avatars that will bring you new adventures in the Metaverse. Each HERO is unique with different Power levels. Collect HERO, CYBER HERO and EPIC HEROs.
